Read the clinical information (mmc1.xlsx) and the two proteomics sheets (A-global-proteomics and B-phospho-proteomics) from mmc2.xlsx.
Filter for clinical records where Case_excluded == 'No' and Histologic_type is either 'Endometrioid' or 'Serous' to define the tumor-sample cohort.
Extract the list of case identifiers from those retained clinical rows.
Filter both proteomics tables for the selected case-identifier columns plus the 'idx' column that labels each protein/phosphosite.
Locate the PLK1 row in the global-proteomics sheet and the CHEK2-S163 row in the phospho-proteomics sheet and pull out the corresponding abundance values for the chosen cases.
Convert the two sets of abundances to numpy arrays and drop every position where the CHEK2-S163 value is NaN (ensuring matched sample pairs and excluding missing values).
Compute the Spearman rank correlation between the cleaned PLK1 and CHEK2-S163 abundance vectors.
Report the resulting correlation coefficient rounded to four decimal places.
